title: Yum! Brands Stock Is Sliding. It’s More Fallout From Grubhub’s Troubles.
text:
Yum! Brands stock slumped by 5% after the fast-food firm reported disappointing third-quarter earnings and a charge related to its stake in Grubhub, the food-delivery company whose stock lost 43% of its value on Tuesday.

The back story. Yum stock (ticker: YUM) is up a little more than 19% year to date, It is trailing behind the S&P 500’s 21% gain, as well as some peers in an industry that has done well this year. In August, the shares touched a new high after Yum reported its second-quarter earnings.

...
description: Yum! Brands reported disappointing third-quarter earnings and a charge related to its stake in Grubhub, the food-delivery company whose stock lost 43% of its value on Tuesday.
